title: 41 card lot of T206's (11 HOFers, 1 SLer, Gandil)SOLD
author: Tao_Moko

posts.post_title: 41 card lot of T206's (11 HOFers, 1 SLer, Gandil)SOLD
posts.post_content:
Images can be viewed here: [url]http://s551.photobucket.com/albums/ii477/tao_moko/[/url]
Note that they're labeled so the front and back images coincide.  e.g. T206TradeFront#1 and T206TradeBack#1

11 HOFers + Foster SLer + Gandil (near complete ChiSox team set).  Condition of the Young, Lajoie and Collins are really nice and will grade nicely.  The Johnson and Walsh present well too.  Cash deal for all 41 cards $2700 (paypal ok +3%).
